description: Weekday: time spent on tv and movies
detail:
Watching or streaming TV shows or movies?
(Such as Hulu, Netflix or Amazon, not including videos on YouTube.)

description: Weekday: time spent streaming videos
detail: Watching or streaming videos or live stream (such as YouTube, Twitch)?

description: Weekday: time spent on single-player video games
detail: Playing single-player video games on a computer, console, phone or other device (Xbox, Play Station, iPad, AppleTV)?

description: Weekday: time spent on multi-player video games
detail: Playing multiplayer video games on a computer, console, phone, or other device (Xbox, Play Station, iPad, AppleTV) where you can interact with others in the game?

description: Weekday: time spent texting
detail: Texting on a cell phone, tablet, computer, iPod, or other electronic device (e.g., GChat, Whatsapp, Kik etc.)?

description: Weekday: time spent scrolling social media
detail: Visiting social media apps or websites (e.g., Snapchat, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, TikTok, etc.? (Do not include time spent editing photos, videos, or creating content to post on social media.)

description: Weekday: time spent curating social media
detail: Editing photos, videos, or creating content to post on social media.

description: Weekday: time spent video-chatting
detail: Video chatting (Zoom, FaceTime, VRchat, Skype, etc.)

description: Weekday: time spent internet browsing
detail: Searching or browsing the internet (e.g., using Google) that is NOT for school.

detail:
